title: La Linea
creator_credit: Frame, Brunetto Del Vita and Osvaldo Cavandoli
brief_description: A series of wildly funny and imaginative episodes involving an animator and his creation, Mr. Line. The animator bedevils his little character by surprising him with all kinds of incongruities. An adventure into divergent, but linear, thinking.
creator_credit_for_label: Frame, Brunetto Del Vita and Osvaldo Cavandoli
